fields.name: Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
*Husk of Opulent Dreams <:4x:957694032216215573>*
• DEF +30%
• The wearer gains one Curiosity stack when hitting an opponent with a Geo attack, or every three seconds while the character is off-field. One Curiosity stack grants a 6% Defense and 6% Geo damage bonus (maximum of four stacks).
